trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Old Bridge Township
There were no other sightings in Old Bridge Township on or around August 9th 1996
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to check the sky for a meteor shower it was scheduled for thefollowing night and I focused my attention on an area of the sky. I was watchingfor about 5 minutes when 3 of the stars started to move across the sky in atriangle formation,at the same speed and distance from each other. They allstopped and a fourth star came over to join the lead star and they got brighterand pulsed. The other 2 stars moved in and out from each other but neverconnected. I then lost sight of them due to light pollution in that part of thesky. I was excited and wanted to get my video camara but I didnt want to missanything.
